manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STRENGTH FROM WITHIN STRENGTH CURE SHAMPOO Gentle, sulfate-free shampoo that fortifies and helps repair damaged, color-treated hair. STRENGTH CURE CONDITIONER Gentle conditioner that fortifies and helps repair damaged, color-treated hair. STRENGTH CURE SUPERFOOD MASK Deeply nourishing treatment with essential nutrients that repairs, strengthens, and protects hair from future damage. STRENGTH CURE MIRACLE FILLER Daily blow-dry reparative lotion that strengthens, repairs and protects the hair's cuticle.

Natural Ingredients + Aromatherapy A powerful hair-strengthening complex, Keravis strengthens & prevents damage while Astaxanthin helps heal & repair. Raspberry & Peach blend with subtle Water Flowers for a fresh as fruit scent. Get The Best Results Apply a dime-sized amount to shampooed hair, focusing on the midlengths & ends. Gently massage through to deeply penetrate, waiting 1-2 minutes to let it do its work, then rinse.

WHICH PUREOLOGY RANGE IS RIGHT FOR YOU? STRENGTH CURE Add to Cart HYDRATE Add to Cart HYDRATE SHEER Add to Cart STRENGTH CURE BLONDE Add to Cart SMOOTH PERFECTION Add to Cart PURE VOLUME Add to Cart NANOWORKS GOLD Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,558 4.7 out of 5 stars 14,322 4.6 out of 5 stars 7,068 4.6 out of 5 stars 2,208 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,655 4.3 out of 5 stars 4,505 4.6 out of 5 stars 723 Price $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $50.00$50.00 HAIR TYPE Damaged, color-treated Normal, dry color-treated Fine, dry color-treated Blonde or highlighted Frizzy, color-treated Fine, color-treated Very dry, dull color-treated HAIR CONCERN Damage, split ends, breakage Dryness, lack of moisture Dryness, lack of moisture Brassy, yellow or orange tones Frizz, curl manageability Lack of volume, fullness, body Dryness, lack of shine BENEFITS Strength and softness Moisture and softness Moisture and softness Neutralizes brass Smoothness and frizz control Body and fullness Softness and shine KEY INGREDIENTS Keravis, Astaxanthin Jojoba, Green Tea, Sage Jojoba, Green Tea, Sage Keravis, Astaxanthin Camellia, Shea Butter Wheat Protein, Eucalyptus Leaf Keravis, Golden Marula Oil FRAGRANCE NOTES Raspberry, Peach, Water Flower Lavender, Bergamot, Mint Lavender, Bergamot, Mint Pear, Rose, Sandalwood Cocoa, Marshmallow Accord Pink Grapefruit, Wild Rose Dewy Pear, Ylang Ylang

Who is Strength Cure for? Strength Cure shampoo and conditioner are for people with damaged, dry and weak hair, of due to color and heat damage and are seeking to and strength and repair hair. What is the difference between Strength Cure & Strength Cure Blonde? Strength Cure Blonde is a purple toning shampoo that is for color-treated blondes who are seeking strength and repair and to tone brassy hair. Strength Cure is for all compromised, color-treated and non-color-treated hair seeking strength and repair. What is the main ingredient in Strength Cure? The main ingredients in Strength Cure are Keravis and Astaxanthin. Keravis is a strengthening protein known to prevent hair breakage and Astaxanthin is an antioxidant part of the exclusive Asta-Repair technology that can heal and repair damaged hair. Is this good for curly hair? Strength Cure shampoo and conditioner has been tested on all hair textures and are an excellent choice for curly hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best conditioner for hair strength and silkiness
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Pureology Strength Cure Conditioner has been one of my favorite hair care products for over a year now. My hair is very fine, but I have a lot of it, so it tangles easily. This conditioner works great for my hair to keep it strong but soft and shiny. It smells divine and the silky consistency is unmatched. I usually separate my hair in two sections and really work this conditioner in and I also let it sit for about 5 minutes to improve the workability. I have used this in combination with the shampoo counterpart and I also use it withy our Pureology shampoos and it still works like a charm. I highly recommend adding this to your hair care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for damaged hair
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is a bit above my price range but I love the results. Great for colored or damaged hair, works without making hair flat or greasy. I wash my bangs with it daily without conditioner since my forehead gets sweaty but i use the matching conditioner on my longer hair which i wash 2 or 3 times a week. Great products from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down the best!
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing keeps my hair soft and smelling great for more than a day! So moisturizing without feeling heavy on the hair. Purology is hands down the best hair care on the market, and that coming from some with long thick hair who’s tried everything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed my damaged hair!
reviews.reviewText: I started using Pureology’s Strength Cure line in hopes of repairing years of damage from bleaching and dying my hair. I’ve been using these products for about two years now, and I’m blown away by the difference it’s made. Not only is my hair softer and less frizzy, but it’s also longer, thicker, and fuller than it’s been in years.Every time I see my hairdresser she comments on how healthy and thick my hair has gotten… And that’s how I know these products truly work!I highly recommend Pureology for those looking to repair dry, damaged or breaking hair. It is well worth the investment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effect on hair - amazing
reviews.reviewText: Since I made the switch to pureology I have been loving it. I use the shampoo & conditioner in combination with the hair mask and my hair is soft, shinny and smells amazing! I noticed I can go 3 days without washing and a little goes a long way with this product also! My hair doesn’t look oily and feel strains after like most products. The price is worth it! I still have more than half the bottle left and I bought this a few months ago! The 21 benefits spray is amazing also! I love that I made the switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really did the job, but very pricey!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I won’t use anything else
reviews.reviewText: My hair went from medium length to touching my waist the year I started using this conditioner. I won’t use anything else. I have long, thick, healthy hair now and it’s seriously thanks to this shampoo, conditioner, and the use of a weekly hair mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair is much softer

reviews.reviewText: I had tired lot of other conditioner but none of them worked. I had almost given up all hope before I found out about this brand. I tried their shampoo as well. they are expensive but they work amazingly well. these repaired my damage hair and leaves them felling super silky and smooth. these do go on sale often, so wait for sale if you can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has really helped my hair within 3-4 washes!! Will be investing in the bigger bottle!
Love this conditioner, keeps my hair smelling great and healthy. I have tried others but it’s not the same. I have coloured hair and it keeps my long hair shiny and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing as per. All purology products are amazing
